sourcesContent:
// src/pages/Credentials.jsx import PageWrapper from "../components/PageWrapper"; import { Linkedin, Github, Mail, Phone, Globe } from "lucide-react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useLanguage } from "../context/LanguageContext"; import { translations } from "../utils/translations"; export default function Credentials() { const { language } = useLanguage(); const t = translations[language] ?? {}; // tiny helper with safe fallback const L = (key, en) => t?.[key] ?? en; const aboutText = L( "credentials_about_text", "I am a passionate and dedicated Next.js developer with expertise in building full-stack applications using Next.js, React.js, and modern web technologies. Currently pursuing a Master's in Material Engineering, my true passion is web development. I enjoy server components, API routes, data fetching, and building responsive, accessible UIs with Tailwind. I love collaborating, shipping polished interactions, and continuously learning new patterns and tools." ); const skills = [ { id: "next", title: L("skills_next_title", "Next.js"), pct: "70%", body: L( "skills_next_body", "Solid understanding of App Router, server components, API routes, dynamic routing and data fetching." ), }, { id: "react", title: L("skills_react_title", "React.js"), pct: "70%", body: L( "skills_react_body", "Comfortable building component-driven UIs, state management, and performance-focused patterns." ), }, { id: "tailwind", title: L("skills_tailwind_title", "Tailwind"), pct: "70%", body: L( "skills_tailwind_body", "Utility-first styling for responsive, accessible, and consistent interfaces." ), }, { id: "js", title: L("skills_js_title", "JavaScript"), pct: "60%", body: L( "skills_js_body", "ES6+ syntax, DOM APIs, async patterns, fetch/REST integrations and tooling." ), }, { id: "css", title: L("skills_css_title", "CSS"), pct: "70%", body: L( "skills_css_body", "Modern layout (Flex/Grid), animations, responsive design, and best practices." ), }, { id: "html", title: L("skills_html_title", "HTML"), pct: "80%", body: L( "skills_html_body", "Semantic structure, accessibility, and SEO-friendly markup." ), }, ]; return (
{/* Left profile card */}
{/* Responsive image wrapper: - portrait aspect on mobile (like your reference) - fixed height on md+ */}

Mohammad Rajabi

@mohammadrajabi

{/* Social icons */}
{L("btn_contact_me", "Contact me")}
{/* Right content */}
{/* About */}

{L("credentials_about_title", "About ME")}

{aboutText}

{/* Skills */}

{L("credentials_skills_title", "SKILLS")}

{skills.map((s) => (

{s.title}

{s.pct}

{s.body}

))}
{/* certificates area could go here */}
); }
